channel.title: CVE Feed for WhiteStudio -- Easy Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WhiteStudio -- Easy Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-30535|2024-03-31T18:16:33.463Z -- WhiteStudio -- Easy Form Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in WhiteStudio Easy Form Builder.This issue affects Easy Form Builder: from n/a through 3.7.4.
